author: National Geographic
description:
Bertie Gregory and Nat Geo capture adolescent penguins in their molting phase, swapping baby fluff for adult feathers before their first ocean swim. But climate change is changing the rules: the sea ice is breaking up too soon. Weighed down and unprepared, can these young penguins overcome this daunting challenge?

Secrets of the Penguins is now streaming on @disneyplus and @hulu. https://on.natgeo.com/4cHzyFv

author: National Geographic
description:
